attributes.action: Move to sanction energy meters directly connected in real time to energy markets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Middle men, profiteering from entrepreneurial inefficiencies in the energy market, should be cut out: thus to allow rational decisions, related to consumption of energy at any particular time, to be reflected in market prices.
At the moment the measuring is so inaccurate so as not to permit people to behave rationally, except to submit to commit frauds in their self-interest, in the hope things will 'work out in time' on direct debits.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
